transportAdvice: Osaka has an extensive and reliable metro and rail network that connects virtually all major tourist areas, making it easy to get around without a car. Walking is practical within neighborhoods, and taxis are widely available though more expensive than public transit.

weather.description: Cold and dry with occasional clear skies, light layers are sufficient but evenings can be quite chilly.
Still cold with occasional rain, but early plum blossoms begin to appear toward the end of the month.
Temperatures begin to warm and cherry blossoms typically start blooming late in the month, making it a popular time to visit.
Pleasant spring weather with cherry blossoms in full bloom early in the month, though crowds are at their peak.
Warm and comfortable with lush greenery, one of the most enjoyable months for sightseeing.
The rainy season begins, bringing frequent showers and rising humidity that can feel oppressive.
Hot, humid, and often rainy early in the month before the rainy season ends, with intense heat persisting throughout.
The hottest month of the year with high humidity and occasional typhoons, outdoor sightseeing is best done in the early morning.
Still warm and humid with a heightened risk of typhoons bringing heavy rain and strong winds.
Comfortable autumn temperatures and beautiful foliage make this one of the best months to visit Osaka.
Cool and crisp with stunning autumn colors peaking mid-month, ideal conditions for exploring the city.
Cold and dry with festive illuminations throughout the city, a quiet but charming time to visit.
